narrative.iWantTo: I test API Key is NOT replaced on the page

scenario.title: (APi Key - Commerce API page) Custom API key is not replaced when user is logged in
scenario.step: Given open Commerce API page
When User is logged to site (Commerce API)
Then check that API key is provided for all placeholders on Commerce API page
